import requests

url = "https://vuelos.p.rapidapi.comhttp://localhost/listavuelos"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
